sentences.chinese: 亞父南向坐。
sentences.literal: Ya Fu south facing sat.
sentences.idiomatic: The Lord Father sat facing south.

sentences.chinese: 亞父者，范增也。
sentences.literal: Ya Fu, Fan Zeng.
sentences.idiomatic: The Lord Father was Fan Zeng.

sentences.chinese: 沛公北向坐，張良西向侍。
sentences.literal: Pei Gong north facing sat, Zhang Liang west facing served.
sentences.idiomatic: Fan Zeng numbered Xiang Yu's faults one by one.

sentences.chinese: 范增數目項王，舉所佩玉珪以示之者三，項王默然不應。
sentences.literal: Fan Zeng frequently eyed Xiang Wang, raised what he wore jade tablet to show him three times, Xiang Wang silently not responded.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu did not listen.

sentences.chinese: 范增起，出召項莊，謂曰：「君王為人不忍，若入前為壽，壽畢，請以劍舞，因擊沛公於坐，殺之。
sentences.literal: Fan Zeng rose, went out summoned Xiang Zhuang, said: 'Lord king as person not cruel, if enter front make toast, toast finished, please with sword dance, take advantage strike Pei Gong at seat, kill him.
sentences.idiomatic: Fan Zeng said: "If you do not listen to my words, your clan will surely be extinguished."

sentences.chinese: 不者，若屬皆且為所虜。」
sentences.literal: If not, your kind all moreover be captured by him.'
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu remained silent.

sentences.chinese: 莊則入為壽，壽畢，曰：「君王與沛公飲，軍中無以為樂，請以劍舞。」
sentences.literal: Zhuang then entered made toast, toast finished, said: 'Lord king with Pei Gong drink, army middle nothing to make merry, please with sword dance.'
sentences.idiomatic: Liu Bang entered Hongmen.

sentences.chinese: 項王曰：「諾。」
sentences.literal: King Xiang said: 'Yes.'
sentences.idiomatic: He said to Xiang Yu: "You and I both labored to destroy Qin.

sentences.chinese: 項莊拔劍起舞，項伯亦拔劍起舞，常以身翼蔽沛公，莊不得擊。
sentences.literal: Xiang Zhuang drew sword rose danced, Xiang Bo also drew sword rose danced, constantly with body flank shielded Pei Gong, Zhuang could not strike.
sentences.idiomatic: I stayed in Guanzhong to guard it.

sentences.chinese: 於是張良至軍門，見樊噲。
sentences.literal: Therefore Zhang Liang arrived army gate, saw Fan Kuai.
sentences.idiomatic: You returned east to settle affairs.

sentences.chinese: 樊噲曰：「今日之事何如？」
sentences.literal: Fan Kuai said: 'Today matters what like?'
sentences.idiomatic: Now there are slanders saying I want to rebel.

sentences.chinese: 良曰：「甚急。
sentences.literal: Liang said: 'Very urgent.
sentences.idiomatic: That is not true. I have come today to clear up these rumors."

sentences.chinese: 今者項莊拔劍舞，其意常在沛公也。」
sentences.literal: Now Xiang Zhuang draws sword dances, his intent constantly at Pei Gong.'
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu said: "It was your subordinate Xiao He who told me."

sentences.chinese: 噲曰：「此迫矣，臣請入，與之同命。」
sentences.literal: Kuai said: 'This urgent, minister please enter, with him same fate.'
sentences.idiomatic: Liu Bang said: "Even if Xiao He told you, it was because of Cao Wushang.

sentences.chinese: 噲即帶劍擁盾入軍門。
sentences.literal: Kuai immediately strapped sword embraced shield entered army gate.
sentences.idiomatic: Cao Wushang betrayed me and told you lies."

sentences.chinese: 交戟之衛士欲止不內，樊噲側其盾以撞，衛士仆地，噲遂入，披帷西向立，瞋目視項王，頭髪上指，目眥盡裂。
sentences.literal: Crossed halberds guards wished stop not admit, Fan Kuai tilted his shield to collide, guards fell ground, Kuai then entered, parted curtain west facing stood, glared eyes viewed Xiang Wang, hair on head pointed up, eye corners completely split.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu believed Liu Bang.

sentences.chinese: 項王按劍而跽曰：「客何為者？」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang pressed sword and knelt said: 'Guest what doing?'
sentences.idiomatic: He set up a banquet at Hongmen.

sentences.chinese: 張良曰：「沛公之參乘樊噲者也。」
sentences.literal: Zhang Liang said: 'Pei Gong chariot rider Fan Kuai.'
sentences.idiomatic: He invited Liu Bang to drink.

sentences.chinese: 項王曰：「壯士，賜之卮酒。」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang said: 'Brave warrior, grant him goblet wine.'
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu and Fan Zeng plotted to kill Liu Bang.

sentences.chinese: 則與斗卮酒。
sentences.literal: Then gave him peck goblet wine.
sentences.idiomatic: They said: "Liu Bang wants to take Guanzhong.

sentences.chinese: 噲拜謝，起，立而飲之。
sentences.literal: Kuai bowed thanked, rose, stood and drank it.
sentences.idiomatic: His ambitions are great. If we don't kill him now, we will regret it later."

sentences.chinese: 項王曰：「賜之彘肩。」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang said: 'Grant him pig shoulder.'
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Yu agreed.

sentences.chinese: 則與一生彘肩。
sentences.literal: Then gave him one whole pig shoulder.
sentences.idiomatic: He ordered Xiang Zhuang to dance with sword.

sentences.chinese: 樊噲覆其盾於地，加彘肩上，拔劍切而啗之。
sentences.literal: Fan Kuai overturned his shield on ground, added pig shoulder on it, drew sword cut and ate it.
sentences.idiomatic: He intended for Xiang Zhuang to attack Liu Bang during the dance.

sentences.chinese: 項王曰：「壯士，能復飲乎？」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang said: 'Brave warrior, able again drink?'
sentences.idiomatic: Fan Zeng repeatedly gave signals to Xiang Zhuang.

sentences.chinese: 樊噲曰：「臣死且不避，卮酒安足辭！
sentences.literal: Fan Kuai said: 'Minister death moreover not avoid, goblet wine how worth refuse!
sentences.idiomatic: But Xiang Zhuang did not understand.

sentences.chinese: 夫秦王有虎狼之心，殺人如不能舉，刑人如恐不勝，天下皆叛之。
sentences.literal: Now Qin king has tiger wolf heart, kill people as cannot lift, punish people as fear not enough, world all rebel him.
sentences.idiomatic: Fan Zeng rose and left the banquet.

sentences.chinese: 懷王與諸將約曰『先破秦入咸陽者王之』。
sentences.literal: Huai Wang with various generals agreed said 'First break Qin enter Xianyang, king him.'
sentences.idiomatic: He called Xiang Zhuang out.

sentences.chinese: 今沛公先破秦入咸陽，豪毛不敢有所近，封閉宮室，還軍霸上，以待大王來。
sentences.literal: Now Pei Gong first broke Qin entered Xianyang, down feather not dared approach anything, sealed closed palaces, returned army Bashang, to wait great king come.
sentences.idiomatic: He said: "The king has not given the order.

sentences.chinese: 故遣將守關者，備他盜出入與非常也。
sentences.literal: Therefore sent general guard pass, prepare other bandits enter exit and extraordinary.
sentences.idiomatic: What are you doing?"

sentences.chinese: 勞苦而功高如此，未有封侯之賞，而聽細說，欲誅有功之人。
sentences.literal: Toiled labored and merit high like this, not yet had enfeoffed marquis reward, yet listen to petty words, wish execute meritorious people.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Zhuang said: "I am dancing with sword."

sentences.chinese: 此亡秦之續耳，竊為大王不取也。」
sentences.literal: This perished Qin continuation, secretly for great king not take.'
sentences.idiomatic: Fan Zeng said: "This is not dancing with sword."

sentences.chinese: 項王未有以應，曰：「坐。」
sentences.literal: Xiang Wang not yet had to respond, said: 'Sit.'
sentences.idiomatic: He struck the pillar with his sword.

sentences.chinese: 樊噲從良坐。
sentences.literal: Fan Kuai followed Liang sat.
sentences.idiomatic: He said: "If you don't kill Liu Bang now, you will all become his prisoners."

sentences.chinese: 坐須臾，沛公起如廁，因招樊噲出。
sentences.literal: Sat brief moment, Pei Gong rose went toilet, took advantage beckoned Fan Kuai out.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Zhuang returned to the banquet.

sentences.chinese: 沛公已出，項王使都尉陳平召沛公。
sentences.literal: Pei Gong already left, Xiang Wang made commandery captain Chen Ping summon Pei Gong.
sentences.idiomatic: He danced with sword again.

sentences.chinese: 沛公曰：「今者出，未辭也，為之柰何？」
sentences.literal: Pei Gong said: 'Now left, not took leave, do what?'
sentences.idiomatic: He approached Liu Bang.

sentences.chinese: 樊噲曰：「大行不顧細謹，大禮不辭小讓。
sentences.literal: Fan Kuai said: 'Great undertakings not consider petty cautions, great rites not refuse small concessions.
sentences.idiomatic: Liu Bang was terrified.

sentences.chinese: 如今人方為刀俎，我為魚肉，何辭為。」
sentences.literal: Now people just are knife chopping block, we are fish meat, what ceremony for.'
sentences.idiomatic: He wanted to flee.

sentences.chinese: 於是遂去。
sentences.literal: Therefore he left.
sentences.idiomatic: Zhang Liang said to Xiang Yu: "The king is drunk."

sentences.chinese: 乃令張良留謝。
sentences.literal: Then ordered Zhang Liang stay apologize.
sentences.idiomatic: He ordered Zhang Liang to leave.

sentences.chinese: 良問曰：「大王來何操？」
sentences.literal: Liang asked said: 'Great king come what hold?'
sentences.idiomatic: Zhang Liang left.

sentences.chinese: 曰：「我持白璧一雙，欲獻項王，玉斗一雙，欲與亞父，會其怒，不敢獻。
sentences.literal: Said: 'I hold white jade disc one pair, wished offer Xiang Wang, jade goblet one pair, wished give Ya Fu, encountered his anger, not dared offer.
sentences.idiomatic: He told Liu Bang: "Leave now."

sentences.chinese: 公為我獻之」張良曰：「謹諾。」
sentences.literal: You for me offer them' Zhang Liang said: 'Respectfully yes.'
sentences.idiomatic: Liu Bang said: "I cannot leave without saying goodbye."

sentences.chinese: 當是時，項王軍在鴻門下，沛公軍在霸上，相去四十里。
sentences.literal: At this time, Xiang Wang army at Hongmen below, Pei Gong army at Bashang, separated forty li.
sentences.idiomatic: He went to the toilet.

sentences.chinese: 沛公則置車騎，脫身獨騎，與樊噲、夏侯嬰、靳彊、紀信等四人持劍盾步走，從酈山下，道芷陽閒行。
sentences.literal: Pei Gong then abandoned chariot cavalry, escaped body alone rode, with Fan Kuai, Xiahou Ying, Jin Qiang, Ji Xin etc. four people held swords shields walked, from Li mountain below, road Zhiyang between went.
sentences.idiomatic: Liu Bang's guard said: "We should leave."

sentences.chinese: 沛公謂張良曰：「從此道至吾軍，不過二十里耳。
sentences.literal: Pei Gong said to Zhang Liang: 'From this road to my army, not over twenty li.
sentences.idiomatic: Liu Bang said: "The host has not dismissed us."

sentences.chinese: 度我至軍中，公乃入。」
sentences.literal: Estimate I arrive army middle, you then enter.'
sentences.idiomatic: He returned to the banquet.

sentences.chinese: 沛公已去，閒至軍中，張良入謝，曰：「沛公不勝桮杓，不能辭。
sentences.literal: Pei Gong already left, after arrived army middle, Zhang Liang entered apologized, said: 'Pei Gong not able ladle, cannot take leave.
sentences.idiomatic: He toasted Xiang Yu.

sentences.chinese: 謹使臣良奉白璧一雙，再拜獻大王足下；
sentences.literal: Respectfully made minister Liang present white jade disc one pair, twice bowed offered great king feet below;
sentences.idiomatic: He said: "I cannot drink much."
